title: How to Search for Players on Clash of Clans

steps.title: Open Clash of Clans.
steps.content: Open Clash of Clans. The Clash of Clans icon has an image that resembles a blond viking. Tap the Clash of Clans logo in your Apps menu or Home screen to launch Clash of Clans. You can download Clash of Clans for free using the App Store on iPhone or iPad, or the Google Play Store on Android.

steps.title: Tap the blue star icon.
steps.content: Tap the blue star icon. It's the blue icon in the upper-left corner. It has your current level number in the middle. This displays the profile menu.

steps.title: Tap the Social tab.
steps.content: Tap the Social tab. It's the third tab at the top of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Search Players.
steps.content: Tap Search Players . It's the third tab at the top of the screen. This displays a search bar.

steps.title: Enter the player's tag in the search bar.
steps.content: Enter the player's tag in the search bar. A player's tag is not the same as their username. The player's tag is the 9-digit alphanumeric number after the "#" sign in their profile. If you are the friend you are searching for does not know their tag, you can find it by tapping the blue star icon with your current level. Then tap the My Profile tab. Your tag is listed below your username in the upper-left corner next to the "#" symbol. If you want to search for a player by their username, you can use this tool to search for players by name. Enter their username in the search bar. This will display all users with that username along with their tag.

steps.title: Tap Search.
steps.content: Tap Search . It's the green button next to the search bar. This will display that player's profile. Tap Add Friend on their profile to add them as a friend. [1] X Research source You can add 100 friends on Clash of Clans.

steps.title: Log in to Game Center on your device.
steps.content: Log in to Game Center on your device. Game Center is a free service that is offered to iPhone and iPad users. If you are using an iPhone or iPad, use the following steps to log in to your Game Center account : Open the Settings menu. Tap Game Center Tap the toggle switch to turn Game Center on. Login with your Apple ID . Tap your nickname (optional). Enter a nickname (optional).

steps.title: Open Clash of Clans.
steps.content: Open Clash of Clans. Clash of Clans has an icon with an image that resembles a blond Viking. Tap the Clash of Clans icon on your Home screen to open Clash of Clans. Clash of Clans will automatically be linked to your Game Center account. You can download Clash of Clans for free using the App Store on iPhone or iPad.

steps.title: Tap the blue star icon.
steps.content: Tap the blue star icon. It's the blue icon in the upper-left corner. It has your current level number in the middle. This displays the profile menu.

steps.title: Tap the Social tab.
steps.content: Tap the Social tab. It's the third tab at the top of the screen. Friends you have added through your Game Center will appear under the Social tab.

steps.title: Tap a friend.
steps.content: Tap a friend. This will display their Clash of Clans profile. To add them as a friend tap Add Friend on their profile. You can add 100 friends on Clash of Clans.

steps.title: Open Clash of Clans.
steps.content: Open Clash of Clans. The Clash of Clans icon has an image that resembles a blond Viking. Tap the Clash of Clans logo in your Apps menu or Home screen to launch Clash of Clans. You can download Clash of Clans for free using the App Store on iPhone or iPad, or the Google Play Store on Android.

steps.title: Tap the Settings icon.
steps.content: Tap the Settings icon. It's the icon that resembles three gears on the right side of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Disconnected next to Supercell ID.
steps.content: Tap Disconnected next to Supercell ID. It's the red button at the top of the screen. This opens the Supercell ID login screen.

steps.title: Tap Log In or Register Now.
steps.content: Tap Log In or Register Now . If you already have a Supercell ID, tap the blue button that says Log In . If you have not registered a Supercell ID, tap the blue text that says Register Now below the blue button.

steps.title: Enter your email address and tap Register or Log In.
steps.content: Enter your email address and tap Register or Log In . If you already have a Supercell ID, enter the email address associated with your Supercell ID and tap Log In . If you do not have a Supercell ID, tap Continue and then enter the email address you'd like to use for your Supercell ID twice. Then tap Register .

steps.title: Enter the confirmation code and tap Submit.
steps.content: Enter the confirmation code and tap Submit . Whether you are registering a new account or logging in with an existing one, a confirmation code will be sent to your email. Open your email and retrieve the 6-digit confirmation code. Enter the 6-digit confirmation code and tap submit. Your Clash of Clans profile is now linked to your Supercell ID. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the Social tab.
steps.content: Tap the Social tab. It's the third tab at the top of the screen. Friends you have added through your Supercell ID will appear under the Social tab. To add a player as a friend, tap their profile in the Social tab. Then tap Add Friend on their profile.
